code: import{GLOBALTYPES}from"../actions/globalTypes";var userTypeReducer=function userTypeReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"user";var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GLOBALTYPES.USER_TYPE:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default userTypeReducer;
